titleInfo.title: Rededication of the Wren Building, College of William and Mary, September 16, 1931.
William and Mary College quarterly historical magazine.

mods.note: In: William and Mary College quarterly historical magazine; v. 12, no. 4, October, 1932; Inscribed on cover by John Stewart Bryan
mods.abstract: Address by Mr. Willliam G. Perry unpon presenting the keys of the building to Dr. James Hardy Dillard, Rector of the College; Letter from Dr. James Hardy Dillard, Rector of the College of William and Mary to Mr. John D. Rockefeller, Jr.; Reply from Mr. Rockefeller; Unveiling of a tablet in honor of John D. Rockefeller, Jr., June 11, 1932--Address of John Stewart Bryan, Vice-Rector of the College of William and Mary.

subject.topic: College of William and Mary. Wren Building (Va.)
